Text:
This comes very, very close to being spam.  Not only does it look like this is a hacked account, but posting URLs to commercial web sites is against the TPB rules and will get you banned.

I have not filed a complaint with the moderators because your PDF contains substantial useful information, not just a couple pages riddled with "click here" links.

But do not post the URL of your commercial site in any other torrent description or I will follow through with the complaint.
